mapper.insert: insert into m_qna(m_qtitle, m_qcontent, mno, m_qdate, a_qcontent, a_qdate) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer.no}, #{registeredDate}, #{answer}, #{answerDate})
mapper.select: select q.m_qno, q.m_qtitle, q.m_qdate, m.mname as writer_name, m.memail as writer_email from m_qna q inner join member m on m.mno=q.mno
select q.m_qno, q.m_qtitle, q.m_qdate, m.mname as writer_name, m.memail as writer_email from m_qna q inner join member m on m.mno=q.mno where m.mno = #{value}

select q.m_qno, q.m_qdate, q.m_qtitle, q.m_qcontent, q.a_qcontent, q.a_qdate, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name, m.memail as writer_email from m_qna q inner join member m on m.mno=q.mno where q.m_qno = #{value}
